ygData.subject: Intro & Advice Request
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail All, I recently subscribed to this mailing list & have lurked a couple of days to get the feel for it before jumping in.  I m a very young (level 3)
ygData.messageBody:
Hail All,

I recently subscribed to this mailing list & have lurked
a couple of days to get the feel for it before jumping
in. I'm a very "young" (level 3) wood elf bard on the
Quellious server. I've left Kelethin because of the
extreme lag, same with Freeport (not to mention that dry
desert air was murder on my delicate elven skin ;). So
as of last night, I'm bound to Rivervale. Eventually I
intend to make it clear across Norrath. Yes, I have
wanderlust -- is it not a good thing I've chosen bard as
my profession? ;)

You are all so knowledgeable ... I'm learning a lot from
reading all your posts. Even though I only have 2 songs,
I've already started playing with the juggling I read
about here (never woulda thought of that myself).

Most of the advice I've read so far will help me when I'm
"grown up" a little (a lot?) more. So I'd like to ask
all of you for advice for a beginning bard. I know some
of the decisions I make at the start will end up
affecting my success later in my life. So any pointers
would be well appreciated.

Thanks in advance,
Wynsong
Wood Elf Bard, Level 3
Rivervale, Quellious

--
~~~ Remember that our illusion of control is just
that ... an illusion ~~~

weya@...
ICQ#1976509
